scripts.demo:stock: echo '\n=== Running with STOCK Nx (no patches) ===' && npm run patch:restore && npx nx release 1.1.0 -p @my-org/utils --skip-publish --first-release --dry-run
scripts.demo:with-logging: npm run patch:restore && npm run patch:logging && echo '\n=== Running with LOGGING patch ===' && npx nx release 1.1.0 -p @my-org/utils --skip-publish --first-release --dry-run; npm run patch:restore
scripts.demo:with-fix: npm run patch:restore && npm run patch:fix && echo '\n=== Running with FIX patch ===' && npx nx release 1.1.0 -p @my-org/utils --skip-publish --first-release --dry-run; npm run patch:restore
scripts.patch:logging: cp patches/nx+22.5.0+with-logging.patch patches/nx+22.5.0.patch && npx patch-package --patch-dir patches
scripts.patch:fix: cp patches/nx+22.5.0+with-fix.patch patches/nx+22.5.0.patch && npx patch-package --patch-dir patches
